alert.note: Alert for Yakima (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 1:45PM PST until March 02 at 5:11AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pendleton OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Naches River near Cliffdell affecting Yakima County. For the Naches River...including Cliffdell, Naches...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pdt. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Naches River near Cliffdell. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM PST Monday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to 31.1 feet tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening to 29.9 feet and begin rising again late Friday morning. It will rise to 30.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 31.4 feet on 02/04/2020. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
